findings.message:
Different versions of Solidity is used in OpenOracleData_1.sol:
	- Version used: ['ABIEncoderV2', '^0.5.12']
	- OpenOracleData_1.sol#1 declares pragma solidity^0.5.12
	- OpenOracleData_1.sol#2 declares pragma experimentalABIEncoderV2
findings.name: pragma

findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in OpenOracleData_1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.12 (OpenOracleData_1.sol#1): it allows old versions
findings.name: solc-version
